label: Lock
exec: LC_TIME=sv_SE.UTF-8 swaylock --screenshots --clock --indicator --indicator-radius 100 --indicator-thickness 7 --effect-blur 7x5 --effect-vignette 0.5:0.5 --color 2e3440 --inside-color 2e3440 --ring-color 3b4252 --key-hl-color b48ead --text-color 88c0d0 --inside-wrong-color bf616a --ring-wrong-color 3b4252 --inside-ver-color 81a1c1 --ring-ver-color 3b4252 --inside-clear-color ebcb8b --ring-clear-color 3b4252 --fade-in 0.2 --font JetBrainsMonoNerdFont
